snippet.title: 「Disgaea 2」 Opening (PC) 「Sinful Rose」 《 Waifu2x | 4K 》
snippet.description:
High Quality Waifu2x AI Upscaled 「Disgaea 2: Cursed Memories」 OP/Opening.
Song: 「Tsumi na Bara」 (Sinful Rose) by 『Yoko』
Disgaea OPs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeaWyiQfGyfNRx03V8jVbhkxdsabGJ9Tz
Game: Disgaea 2: Cursed Memories
Source: pc-rip | 480p
Upscaling process:
1. "waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan" ( -n 2 -s 2 )
2. "waifu2x-ncnn-vulkan" ( -n 3 -s 1 )
3. ffmpeg encode:
3-1. ffmpeg -framerate "xx" -i "image%d.png" -c:v libx264 -crf 15 -s 2880x2160 -profile:v high444 -deblock -2:-1 -pix_fmt yuv444p -use_editlist 0 -movflags +faststart "video.mp4"
3-2. ffmpeg -i "audio-source" -c:a flac -ac 2 -ar 44100 "audio.flac"
3-3. ffmpeg -i "video.mp4" -i "audio.flac" -c copy -shortest -map 0:v -map 1:a -strict -2 "video-complete.mp4"
Tag: disgaea Disgaea 2 Cursed Memories op opening disgaea all openings intro Tsumi na Bara Sinful Rose Yoko tenpei sato waifu2x ai upscale 4k hd hq ai upscaling jrpg anime vn game rpg srpg 魔界戦記ディスガイア 魔界ウォーズ makai senki disgaea 2 3 4 5 6 d2 complete+ makai wars absence of justice absence of detention return hour of darkness cursed memories a promise unforgotten alliance of vengeance afternoon of darkness dark hero days a promise revisited a brighter darkness ps3 ps4 ps2 psp pc switch psv mobile android ios remaster
